title: The Ugly Truth About Maduro Cigars
itunes:title: The Ugly Truth About Maduro Cigars
description:
We at The Cigar Authority love a little controversy and today, we go dark and reveal THE UGLY TRUTH ABOUT MADURO CIGARS… we are going to pull the curtain back and tell you the processes, good and bad.

We will light up the Liga Privada T52 and the La Galera Maduro plus we will share with you some of our favorite Maduro sticks… Be sure to join us live on TheCigarAuthority.com and let us know your thoughts in our chat room.

We are live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we mention at www.2guyscigars.com.
